item.title: Chai-O-Mania
item.dc:creator: eswarspace
item.content:encoded:
“I must drink lots of tea or I cannot work. Tea unleashes the potential which slumbers in the depth of my soul.” -Leo Tolstoy

ABOUT US

Chai-o-Mania is a new Tea sip sensation we are introducing to our India. We meticulously procure the quality tealeaves across the nation, treat them with utmost care and love in making the memorable cup of chai to our people. Chai-o-mania’s team is aiming to deliver the everlasting tea experience to our loving customers.

VISION

Chai-o-Mania envisions being a honeycomb for our loving customers who senses the taste of honey through our remarkable chai. Our brand must be everyone’s best friend to hangout and enjoy the splendid experience of our chai. We must destine ourselves through our community to be the unique chai makers in the industry.

From starting to ending, every sip of our teas has a story to reminisce, to discuss and to share. The stories are what our customers are busy in making and we become a part of theirs story and make it worthy through our joyous chai-o-mania’s cup of chai. Giving them, this force of story making journey is our never-ending mission to accomplish.

MISSION

item.title: Core Values
item.dc:creator: eswarspace
item.content:encoded:
Enjoy Our Tea Experience

Quality and Taste

Trust comes with Quality and quality comes from responsibility. We believe this and never turn our backs in delivering quality, service, and giving them that thematic store ambience one never experienced. Our chai leaves quality and taste is what stands us apart from the crowd. The main reason for our taste is our tealeaves, procured and processed from country’s largest tea estates.

Taste, Health and Hygiene

Hygiene

Chai-o-Mania not only awakens senses through magic cup but also assures hygienic atmosphere to our chai lovers. Hygiene starts at first steps of entering into our store and the cleanliness at every front makes people fall in love with us. Every element in the store happens to be the nature protected and environment friendly with utmost hygiene values.

Health

It’s not just cup of chai with best-procured and processed tealeaves. It is all about a cup of joy along with many nutritional and health benefits blended in it.

Every cup of chai raises the bar and shocks the chai lovers after getting to know that chai-o-Mania is not only delivering joy but also health. Every cup served to you comes along with the facts of how it is benefitting your health. This is our trademark and success to our story

Menu of Joy

Classic Mania Chai

The classic never fades.
Classic mania chai is the trademark and everyone's delight. once tasted the taste lasts forever.

Aroma Fusion Chai

The aroma fusion chai is your senses best friend. Sip your chai to find your real identity.

Great Escape Chai

Want to escape from this real world then get your great escape chai and land up to the Pandora.

Book Your Joy Table

To book a table, call us 040-229347584 or use the form below.

item.title: Franchise and Collaborate
item.dc:creator: eswarspace
item.content:encoded:
Franchise

Chai-o-Mania Sip sensation has already begun and now it has become everyone’s favourite. We are delivering happiness through our outlets. Do u want to deliver happiness to your chai lovers by owning your own outlet and join this sip of sensation then?

Become the franchise owner of this sensation and establish yourself as an entrepreneur this India needs. We are empowered and we want every one of us to be empowered.

Why to delay this journey. Join us. Let us travel together and bring joy through our magic cup.

Invest less, gain high margins and peoples trust later leave rest to us. It is our promise to scale you higher.

Collaborate

Every celebration has its own purpose. Escalate your celebration with us. Collaborate with us, see the purpose of celebration hovers and manifest with joy and contentment.

Chai-o-Mania knows how to bring smiles to your event. We design, apply a theme for your occasion and make it your everlasting memoir.
